titles.title: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha: Lyrical Omocha Hako
Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha: Lyrical Toy Box
魔法少女リリカルなのは リリカルおもちゃ箱

anime.description: Lyrical Toy Box is a merchandise CD, released for Triangle Heart 3 on June 29, 2001. It contains a large amount of fan material, including a number of visual novel-like stories called "mini-scenarios". One of them, entitled "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha", cast http://anidb.net/ch17279 [Takamachi Nanoha] (a minor character in the TH3 canon) as a magical girl and served as a prototype for the Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha anime series. Nanoha herself calls the Music Video section as the Opening of the anime. Source: Nanoha wikia

character.name: Chrono Harlaown
character.description: Chrono is a 14 year old mage from Mid-Childa. Chrono serves as commissioned officer on Time-Space Administration Bureau`s spaceship Asura commanded by his mother Admiral Lindy Harlaown.

character.name: Lindy Harlaown
character.description: Lindy Harlaown is the commander of Time-Space Administration Bureau`s spaceship Asura. She is also the mother of Enforcer Chrono who servers on the same spaceship. Lindy enjoys drinking green tea with sugar, which always disgusts Nanoha (remember: never drink green tea with sugar as it goes against Chinese traditions plus it`s gross).

character.name: Takamachi Nanoha
character.description: Nanoha is the youngest Takamachi, and has no need for swords, as she, around twelve years old, is almost completely removed from the conflict. She is a cheerful girl who makes friends with even those that hate humanity.

character.name: Noel K. Ehrlichkeit
character.description: Noel K. Ehrlichkeit is the head maid of the Tsukimura household.

character.name: Tsukimura Shinobu
character.description: Tsukimura Shinobu is Suzuka`s older sister and appears to be in the early stages of a relationship with Kyouya, which he appears to be unwilling to admit.

character.name: Takamachi Shirou
character.description: Takamachi Shirou is Nanoha Takamachi`s father and, thus, formally the head of the Takamachi family.

character.name: Takamachi Momoko
character.description: Takamachi Momoko is the mother of Nanoha Takamachi, Kyouya Takamachi and Miyuki Takamachi, as well as the wife of Shirou Takamachi.

character.name: Takamachi Miyuki
character.description: Takamachi Miyuki, like her brother, is also a lead character of Triangle Hearts and is similarly proficient with swords. Though appearing a small number of times, it is evident that everything save her age and profession has been left unchanged from Triangle Heart.
